chapter.title: Configuring ownCloud Sync Clients
chapter.para: The ownCloud Sync Clients allows you to synchronize your local machine with your ownCloud application. Files on your ownCloud are automatically the same as the ones on the local disk.
Following these simple steps you can have all your data both in your personal devices and in the cloud.

listitem.para: Download the client available for your Operating System. Get it at
Execute the .exe file and start the installation wizard.
Finish all the steps and create an ownCloud connection by entering the URL/ IP Address of the machine where you installed the Bitnami ownCloud stack.
A folder in your system is created. Every file you add into this folder will be syncronize with your ownCloud application. It is ususally located in %SystemRoot%\Users\pcname\app data\local\owncloud
